meanings.definition: The act of making pregnant or fertilizing
meanings.sent1: The impregnations of the flowers by the bees led to the growth of new plants.
meanings.sent2: The impregnations of the soil with nutrients helped the crops thrive.
meanings.sent3: The impregnations of the dough with yeast made the bread rise beautifully.
meanings.sent4: The impregnations of the canvas with paint transformed it into a colorful masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The impregnations of the clouds with rain brought relief to the parched land.

meanings.definition: The state of being impregnated or fertilized
meanings.sent1: The impregnations of the eggs resulted in the birth of healthy chicks.
meanings.sent2: The impregnations of the soil ensured the growth of strong roots.
meanings.sent3: The impregnations of the fabric with dye created vibrant patterns.
meanings.sent4: The impregnations of the mind with knowledge expanded intellectual horizons.
meanings.sent5: The impregnations of the atmosphere with oxygen sustained life on Earth.
